name: Spirit Joint Provider Hedged
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpiritSwap](https://app.spiritswap.finance) also this strategy limits Impermanent Loss via Hedgil in a protection range while earning SPIRIT and fees. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pairs, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
